data.client_settings: Desktop Canary, Build 22496 + Firefox Stable Build 22333
data.actual_result: The date is shown behind the New Message text
data.expected_result: The date should be invisible - not to be shown
data.short_description: In Hungarian the red New Messages overlay with the date timestamp
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your language to Hungarian (Magyar) - Find a channel where both a grey date timestamp would be in the middle and a red New Messages text would be - See the grey date behind the red New Messages text
